name: Ginkakumon Promote
effect: ＜Rush＞ (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play.)[On Play] You may place 1 [Kinkakumon] and/or 1 [Ginkakumon] from your trash in this card's digivolution cards in any order. If you place 2 cards with this effect, trigger ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck) and gain 1 memory.
